reviews: Smells exactly like fierce from Abercrombie. Love it so much and a great value also.  Not dissatisfied with this at all.  Only knock is it doesn't last as long but I'll gladly give that up co soldering the cost of the real one.
Smells like a perfect match! Buy it if you love fierce.
Smells like he real deal... However, smell doesn't last long. For the price I am more than happy and would buy it again for sure. Thanks
Smells just like a certain store in the mall, there's a lot of it too.
Smells like Abercrombie and Fitch but for a fraction of a price. I love it
Smells just like Abercrombie. lasts 4 to 5 hours.
Smells exactly like Abercrombie fitch fierce!!
Smells and lasts like the real thing. Saved myself $40 dollars in the process.
Smells just like fierce from Abercrombie and fitch and the smell lasts for a long time
